what_you_do: Co-Creating the New World is an impact school for change makers, focusing on leadership education and community building through the Prosperity Code program.
who_you_serve: The target audience includes leaders, entrepreneurs, change makers, and humanitarians who are looking to make a difference in the world.
current_projects: Season 2 of the podcast, Wisdom in Action, and the Prosperity Code leadership program.
